name: Shitsuji ga Aruji o Erabu Toki
name_original: Shitsuji ga Aruji o Erabu Toki
description:
Shitsuji ga Aruji o Erabu Toki is an adventure game developed by TGL and Peas Soft. It came out on 24-05-2013. Peas Soft published the game.
You can play Shitsuji ga Aruji o Erabu Toki on PC, PS Vita and PlayStation 4.
